chandayak atha langa nisa me dinawala pare yanawita amuthuma prithiyak danenawaya.danma ma parawal wala sudu thinthen liyannata patan aragena ya,kodi damala ya , thana thana postar alawala ya.wishala mahanuwara wage sundaraya.postar wala liya thibu waki eetath wada manaram eewa ya.eewa dakina wita tikak withara parana waki da mathak wana nisa prithiya deguna theguna wenawaya.ese mathak wu parana waki hewath slogans kihipayak pahatha dakwena athara eewa mathak wimen danunu prithiya warahan ...

ga/santha alawishiyas widyaliya kandayama asun gena athi: (wame sita dakunata) dilanjana sandipa (puhunu karu), mewan hemasara (upanayaka), garu dominik samira piyathuma (ragar kridabhara aacharya), jagath semasinha (kripada paripalaka), nayanapriya perera mahatha ( widuhalpathi), prasanna wiraman mahatha (niyojya widuhalpathi krida), hiruwinda gurugamage (nayaka), kawindu dilshan (sahaya puhunukaru), ke.ech.es. perera (puhunukaru kanishta) palamu pela : (wame sita dakunata) isuru dilshan, janith shaminda, kawindu lakshan, saliya bandara, manusha sandaruwan, gamitha sandaruwan, yasindu dilshan, punsara sandaruwan, rusiru lakshitha, thambaara kaushan, rayan subhasinha dewana pela: (wame sita dakunata) oodatha sahiranga, rawindu kawishan, randika chamod, nimesh malinda, akalanka bandara, himash rawisha, gayeshan nawody, misal chamathka, hasindra achintha thewana pela: (wame sita dakunata) mahilka shehan, amindu kaushalya), manusha kawin, rajitha wirasinha, lakshan dhananjaya, pasindu prawin ga/richmand widyaliya kandayama asun gena (wame sita dakunata) dulara malinga (upa nayaka) , pi.ke. samarahewa mahatha (puhunukaru), es.aar. nanayakkara mahatha ( kridabhara aacharya), sampath werageda mahatha(widuhalpathi), es.es. nagahawaththa mahatha (niyojya widuhalpathi), udara aadihetti mahatha(ragar bhara aacharya), udara sachintha (nayaka).

eya wadath balapawe gambada sinamahal walataya.chithrapata narambaime karyaya itha pahasuwen gedarata giyeya.ehi wadathma wegawath piyawara wanuye chithrapata anthar jalaya haraha ba gannata ැkiwimath samagaya.kese wethath me samaga sinamahal kara adi ena prekshaka sankhyawe dawantha pasubamak athi wannata wiya.gruhastha chithrapata narambaime upakarana sulabha wimath samaga sinamahalaka duk windinawata wada pahasuwen siyallata ekata chithrapata narambaime awasthawa kalanurupawa hada ganime awasthawa labina.warthamanaye sinamahal adhika aadayam labanuye prekshaka wardhanayata wada prewsha pathraye mila sapekashawa ihala yamath samagaya.merata aluthin idiwana sinamahal parani sinamahalwalata wada thathwaya tharamak hondaya.
